name: Golf Tour
description: Golf Tour - a journey for friends. Play holes in different corners of the world, decorate your ball, create unique textures for it, and show off to your fellow players. New challenges await you all around the world!

name: Up Hike
description: A vertical platformer where player needs to reach the top without falling

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 04
description: Collect two twin-cylinder supersports with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 04!

name: Ride 5: Racing Icons Pack
description: With RIDE 5 - Racing Icons Pack, you can race iconic bikes on a track that has been the scene of many memorable races, Estoril!

name: Tyrone Soulz: Bitch Ass Pussy Mode
description: Show Tyrone who's boss with this DLC (Difficulty Lowering Compromise), a modification to TYRONE SOULZ that caters specifically to those who struggle to rise to the occasion. The powerful Tyrone will be neutered in various ways, making him easier, but less satisfying, to defeat.

name: Soundscape
description: Exploratory musical metaverse hybrid reality warp world.

name: Project Galaxy
description: Project Galaxy is a 2-dimensional version of the Roblox game "Galaxy". You'll play as a miner sent to hostile alien-infested territory to mine asteroids for ores and return home to fulfill your contract.

name: Guardian of Civilization
description: In history, many brilliant civilizations faced annihilation due to the invasion of powerful empires, leaving only sighs of regret. In a fictional world, you will take on the role Guardian of Civilization. Can you help these civilizations grow and thrive, resisting the invasion of formidable enemies?

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Character EX Pack - Perverted Extreme Masochist
description: This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Perverted Extreme Masochist.” Now you can play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Perverted Masochist.

name: Mine? Sweeper
description: In this twist on minesweeper, find all treasures while avoiding mines to clear stages. Use items, deduce from nearby counts, or guess to identify tiles. Features a large-scale mode with multiple stages leading to a final treasure, and a small-scale mode focused on deducing a single stage.

name: Library Fantasy
description: You are a powerful sorcerer working in a vast library of magic known as Fantasia. You need to unravel its secrets and restore order. Fantasia was known for its unparalleled collections of magical books, artifacts and knowledge, but in recent days, something has gone wrong.

name: ZomBay
description: ZomBay is a zombie shoot'em up game. Survive waves of endless zombies and gain exp to get the best guns!

name: Interstellar Plunderer
description: Interstellar Plunderer is an indie arcade-style 3D roguelike space shooter game. Take control of a pirate spaceship as you fly through wormholes, do battles with hordes of oncoming enemies, fight fearsome bosses, and gain plunder to spend on new ships and upgrades. How far can you go?

name: The Killing Antidote
description: In the future, pharmaceutical company, X-Gene created a dangerous, monster making virus. Jodi, a fearless investigative journalist, is going to get to the bottom of this and doesn't care who's at the top!

name: Cards Against Formality
description: Click the play button above. Play anonymously, or sign in with your favourite social media account. Then proceed to play with your friends and family. Works great on mobile, desktop or tablet!

name: Mashiro Witch: Midnight Marchen
description: In March 2017, SquareEnix announced a dark fantasy RPG for mobile devices from the makers of their Million Arthur games. It featured magical girls fighting horrific demonic entities in team battle. It featured full character customization and cooperative elements. It was released later the same year.

name: Guns n' Souls feat. Song Summoner
description: A sequel to Song Summoner: The Unsung Heroes. Players control Ziggy once again, who now powers his magic sword with cards representing different characters, each possessing unique musical instruments.

name: Ben 10: Omniverse 2
description:
Wii port of Ben 10: Omniverse 2

Ben 10: Omniverse 2 is an 3D action game based on the Ben 10: Omniverse animated series. Emperor Millious of the Incursean empire has exiled Ben to space. After being rescued by Azmuth the both of them end up on a Incursean cruiser on course for Earth.

The player takes control of Ben and can transform in to a multitude of aliens that vary in size, and abilities. Alien forms can be upgraded and more powerful attacks can be unlocked by collecting green watch symbols.

name: Ben 10: Omniverse 2
description: Set off on an all-new adventure with Ben as he infiltrates Incursean battleships to secretly return to Earth.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Arter
description:
Super Arter is a puzzle/platform game inspired by the Mario vs Donkey Kong, with an emphasis on pick up the key to take to the door solving puzzles. Featuring pixel art inspired by 16bits games.

Jump, throw objects, use switches, dodge traps, defeat enemies and much more to overcome the obstacles in your path, while looking for the key to open the door to the next level, and free your way until you face the boss of each world to collect all Domino Relics.

-Solve various puzzles in up to 5 different worlds with many stages.

-Face a powerful boss at the end of each world

Recover the Domino Relics stolen by the Dark Wizard, solving the most challenging puzzles, facing enemies, collecting gifts, and discovering the best way for Arter to take the key to the door, in this Puzzle/Platform game.

name: Firebird
description: You play a firefighter who has to extinguish fires started by the firebird.

name: Laser Bounce
description: Space shooter

name: Bug Battle

name: Cargo Simulator 2019: Turkey

name: Shakedown Rally

name: Escape the Glitch
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure within a haunting, fog-laden forest in our latest game. Your mission: collect five scattered bottles hidden in houses across the map, all while avoiding the ominous presence of the glitcher.

name: Euphoria: Supreme Mechanics
description: Supreme Mechanics is a first-person puzzle game combining elements of social fiction, detective and horror with deep philosophical insight.

name: Shines Over: The Damned
description:
Shines Over: The Damned will take you into a unique experimental horror experience in first person, where your senses will be tested and your reality questioned.

You have no name, no memory, no weapons. There are no friends to protect you. You are alone except for your faithful German Shepherd dog, who will guide you through this dark world and stay by your side.

Immerse yourself in a mysterious and terrifying walking simulator with your faithful companion, where jump scares, tension, and environmental puzzles surround you, and danger lies in wait.

Beware of the horrors that await you in Shines Over: The Damned. You have been warned…

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout Anthology
description: A narrative puzzle-adventure game based on Brian Jacques' Redwall️ book series. Vicious searats are invading the once peaceful Mossflower wood and it's up to the Lilygrove Scout Corps' newest recruit to save the day. Play as Sophia or Liam on their adventure to Redwall Abbey!

name: Jetpack Joyride 2
description: An Apple Vision Pro port of Jetpack Joyride 2.

name: Darts Club
description: Join the Darts Club and compete for the dart throwing championship cup!

name: Monster Legacy: New Horizons
description: Discover the adventures of these peculiar adventurous children who explore fantastic worlds and encounter monsters of all types.

name: Pool Together 2
description: Leave it all behind, kick back, and chill in Pool Together 2!

name: Project Roll
description: Tilt the floor to roll the ball!

Day One Edition includes:

name: Virtua Striker 2 Version '98
description: Virtua Striker 2 Version '98 is an expanded version of Virtua Striker 2 for Sega Model 3 arcade hardware. Version '98 has the same number of teams as the orignial (26), but changes some of the countries.

name: Drealegy
description: Hack and slash demons in the dream world to gain energy and talk to people IRL! Capture hearts smooth talking! Make your Rock band! Explore Rougvania Castle with a mindblowing mix perspective while harvesting energy to become a Rock Star!

name: Figment 1 + Figment 2: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Complete Edition
description: On the night of March 14th 2001, exactly one day after the incident at Yeondu High, four individuals return to the school in search of answers to the unsolved mysteries that haunt them. Uncover the hidden dark truth in this direct sequel to the Korean horror cult classic. Investigate bizarre phenomena, evade bloodthirsty killers, and unravel a twisting narrative across three unnerving episodes.

name: Construction Simulator: Gold Edition
description: The Gold Edition of Construction Simulator offers an all-inclusive experience for aspiring construction entrepreneurs. This comprehensive bundle includes the base game, which already boasts over 100 construction contracts and a selection of more than 90 construction machines from 24 licensed manufacturers. But that's not all - the Gold Edition comes packed with additional content released prior to this version.

name: Virtua Striker 2 Version '99
description: Virtua Striker 2 Version '99 is an expanded version of Virtua Striker 2 for Sega Model 3 arcade hardware. Version '99 adds a further three teams to the Version '98 roster, bringing the total to 29.

name: Blindsighted
description: Navigate a platformer using only feeling and memory, each death meaning progress. With your memory illuminating your path, you'll "see" a little more of the level each time you attempt it.

name: Rogue Ninja: Elemental Onslaught
description: Create your own build by strategically combining ninjutsus and perks. Maneuver through movement and engage with enemies, survive as long as possible.

name: Matching Meadows
description: Matching Meadows is a deck-based puzzle game that combines the simple pleasures of building a vibrant city with challenging objectives. Build your own idyllic landscape! To reach the top of the leaderboards, you'll have to strategize and carefully plan ahead.

name: Virtua Striker 2 Ver. 2000
description: Virtua Striker 2 Ver. 2000 is an expanded version of Virtua Striker 2. This version contained significant changes compared to the prior expansions, as it ran on the more capable Sega NAOMI arcade hardware, rather than Sega Model 3. Ver. 2000 adds a further five normal teams to the Version '99 roster and a third secret team, bringing the total to 35.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 11
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 50 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Dubai
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Dubai landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Pigmenta
description: Pigmenta is an ambient logic puzzle game where you mix colors

name: Saikuru
description: Welcome to Saikuru. Observe the environment and choose the right path to complete the cycle.

name: Six Blow: Hatching Eggs
description: "Six Blow: Hatching Eggs" combines FPS-Deckbuilding. Action with living bullet cards. Survive the Wild West, customize your shots, and strategize!

name: Snow Cone Serenade
description: Snow Cone Serenade is a short and sweet liminal adventure. Choose your mood and roll the dice to succeed or fail in spicy situations. Enter a cursed snow world to save your sick dog, Jedediah. Unravel a mind-bending mystery to face your innermost fears.

name: Rain Runner
description: Rain Runner is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS where you ditch your keyboard and only use your mouse! You'll run constantly where you look, shoot targets and dash through challenging platforms. No checkpoints, no pauses: beat it in one sitting! Run, die, learn, repeat. Be better, be faster.

name: Cellfish
description: Collect food to evolve and fight for your life against enemy cells in this deep underwater, survivor-like, roguelite experience. Unlock parts to customize your character and become your own unique cell.

name: Asurya's Embers
description: Asurya's Embers is a 1st-person, single-player, bow-and-arrow shooter set in an ancient Himalayan village plagued by an environmental disaster. Find safety in the shadows from the blazing heat waves as Dawa, a bow-wielding hero who protects her village from the vengeful sun god, Asurya.

name: I Commissioned Some Mice 2
description: I paid more artists to hide mice and cheese in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Paper Dash: City Hustle
description: Start an adventure as a courageous paper plane hunts evil ghosts across vibrant worlds. Soar through mystical forests and scary mansions, utilizing your flying skills and reflexes to shoot the ghosts.

name: Harmonis: The Hand-Made Kingdoms
description: Harmonis: The Hand-Made Kingdoms is a minimalist strategy game where you shape living kingdoms with unique tiles. Explore biomes, complete quests, and unlock new elements. Immerse yourself in a serene atmosphere as you design vibrant, living worlds bursting with your creativity.

name: Hidden Robo Cats
description: Hidden Robo Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this biggest Robo Cat factory! Beep... Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game

name: MegaMod
description:
Step into the thrilling world of MEGAMOD, where thousands of user-generated games await your discovery!
With daily additions spanning from exhilarating parkour challenges to immersive quests and adrenaline-pumping runners, there's never a dull moment on our platform.

Unleash your creativity as a creator or dive into endless adventures as a player—MEGAMOD is your gateway to boundless fun and excitement!

name: House Party: Valentine's Day Holiday Pack
description:
Happy Valentine's Day, Partiers!
In this Valentine's Day DLC you'll be able to enjoy various Valentine's Day accessories.

name: Burning Love
description: Burning Love is a Yandere Simulator spin-off visual novel made by Michaela Laws and YandereDev.

name: Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits
description:
Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits for PlayStation and Sega Saturn is a compilation of the Arcade games: Robotron: 2084, Joust, Sinistar, Defender, Defender II and Bubbles. Also included are video interviews with the original developers.

The Sega Saturn release was published by Midway Home Entertainment and retitled to Midway Presents Arcade's Greatest Hits.

It was also released for Super Nintendo Entertainment System and Sega Mega Drive/Genesis but without Bubbles and the video interviews.

name: My Little Pony Hair Salon
description: Get ready to have some fun in the Ponyville, ladies! Four of your favorite ponies feature this brand new hair salon game for girls on DressUpWho.com and you’re invite to join Applejack in and help her impress her colourful clients with her amazing hairstyling skills. Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and Twilight Sparkle are going to be your clients of the day and you and Applejack need to make sure they leave your beauty place with a huge smile on their face and looking jaw-dropping. Ready? Now get ‘My Little Pony Hair Salon’ game started and see that crazy are looks you can put together for the three ponies looking for a change. Use your mouse to guide Applejack in the hairstyling process and once you’re done with each of your clients… dress them up in super cool outfits and matching accessories. Have fun, ladies!

name: Out of the Park Baseball 25
description:
Out of the Park Baseball 25 marks a milestone - 25 years of sports gaming excellence!
Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc. and KBO, this year's Anniversary Edition puts you in charge of your favorite baseball franchise. Your team, your legacy, your dynasty. Play what the pros play!

name: Lowrider Hopping
description: This indie game is inspired by the lowrider and hip-hop subcultures. Feel the vibes of the neighborhood with hip hop beats. Ride a lowrider around the block and improve your skills in controlling the hydraulic suspension to pick up items.

name: No Man's Sky: Omega
description: The OMEGA update invites everybody to embark upon a new shared interstellar expedition entirely for free, whether they already own No Man’s Sky or not. Featuring a complete overhaul of expeditions, new on-planet missions, claimable pirate freighters, and much more!

name: Bitmap Bureau Collection
description:
Three retro classics by Bitmap Bureau, for one incredible collection of arcade mayhem.

Run and gun your way through thousands of adversaries in Xeno Crisis, searching for survivors, and ultimately facing the origin of the outpost’s demise.

Hack ‘N’ Slash your way through Battle Axe, with true to form gameplay mechanics and the fantastical pixel art world of Mercia to discover.

Beat ‘em up in Final Vendetta with nostalgic arcade graphics and a tough cast of core characters to fight with.

name: Tap-Tap Shots
description:
Catch fire in this hot, epic and lively basketball game!

Tap-Tap Shots is an incredible endless basketball game in which you have to try to score as many baskets in a row as possible. You're given a basketball and a series of nets of different heights to shoot - just tap the screen to make the ball move. Each shot requires more than one touch and you must time your touch perfectly to push the ball into the net.

name: Lethal Love
description: Lethal Love is an immersive stealth open-world yandere game set within a sprawling school map, where players assume the role of Kyoko, a complex and deeply disturbed protagonist. In this game, players explore a meticulously crafted open world, teeming with secrets, rivalries, and forbidden desires.

name: The Journey of Piggy
description: The Journey of Piggy is a roguelike adventure game with fast-paced, shoot 'em up combat set in a beautifully hand-drawn world. Choose from a variety of weapons, cards and power-ups to create unique builds and survive until the end.

name: Ask her out
description: A perfectly healthy and adequately normal conversation amongst friends turns into something else entirely.

name: Steptile
description:
An ancient boardgame filled with steps and tiles. 20 tiny levels to solve and many, many tiles to step!

Maybe some secret stages too?

name: Doggo
description: Dog-based speed running platformer. Featuring Online Leaderboards, 20+ levels and over 35 collectable cosmetics for your dog.

name: Get Out
description: Get Out is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror. Complete tasks and puzzles to banish the entities that have you and your team trapped, and make sure to get out, before they get you.

description:
Master the weapons and take back the post-apocalyptic Earth!

"MASTER OF WEAPON" is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1989. It takes place on an Earth ravaged by a seven-day nuclear war. The supercomputer ‘N’, designed to lead the survivors to salvation, has run amok and the young protagonist, Yukiwo, must make a stand against it! Master a variety of weapons to defeat the mutant monsters and robotic weapons!

Navigate the neon-lit streets, battle Arcade-Bosses, confront enemy civilians, and combat cyber aliens, all in pursuit of reuniting with man's best friend.

Experience an electrifying cyber thrill ride with the Ghostrunner Game Bundle, featuring the adrenaline-pumping original Ghostrunner and its highly anticipated sequel, Ghostrunner 2.

With this bundle, you'll unlock high-octane action and breathtaking visuals, immersing yourself in the cutting-edge gameplay that defines the Ghostrunner series. Get ready to run, leap, and slash as you embark on a double-dose of Dharma in this must-have cyber ninja experience.

Collect all the creatures, called Fables, in the name of science within the region of Soltera. Discover and buy upgrades to further your output.

But watch out: There's only a limited number of lives available for this.

name: Drift Runners
description:
Great skiddy flash driving game.
Race round tracks, defeating opponents to unlock further tracks.
But that’s just the beginning. This game is about getting high scores. Anyone can win a race, but can you do it in style?
Get points for hitting things, destroying things, and skidding. Drift through groups of objects for big score multipliers (and lots of fun).
Collect coins to upgrade your vehicle in the shop.
The game keeps track of your best times and total scores etc. You build up your high score by totalling all your scores on each level.

name: Last 4 Survive: The Outbreak
description: New heroes have arrived! Single play is a tense story about escaping from the zombie city! Do a battle and play with each other for up to maximum 4 people!

name: Truck Sim 2024
description: In Truck Sim 2024, players are thrust into the driver's seat of their own destiny. With a plethora of missions awaiting completion, from delivering crucial cargo to overcoming treacherous obstacles, every journey presents new opportunities and challenges. Whether it's hauling precious goods across long distances or tackling time-sensitive deliveries, the road ahead is yours to conquer.

name: Bucket Crusher: Around The World
description:
Tear down new walls in the shape of unusual things from different places and put on new funny skins!
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- cactus wall
- dinosaur egg wall
- chest wall
- balloon wall
- windmill wall
- lighthouse wall
- pyramid wall
- chimney wall
- gear skin
- rudder skin

Use your skins to completely destroy the new walls until not a single brick remains!

name: Bucket Crusher: Holiday Spirit
description:
Tear down new walls in the shape of holiday items and put on new sweet skins!
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- cookie wall
- christmas sock wall
- bells wall
- christmas tree wall
- Santa's house wall
- snowman wall
- hot chocolate wall
- gift wall
- donut skin

name: Bucket Crusher: Cool Kidz
description:
Tear down new walls in the shape of children's items and put on new toy skins!
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- chocolate bar wall
- orange juice wall
- rubber duck wall
- teddy bear wall
- hanoi tower wall
- notebook wall
- chess tower wall
- speaker wall
- fidget spinner skin
- color pencils skin

Use your toy skins to completely destroy the new walls until not a single brick remains!

name: Membal
description:
Welcome to Membal: Your Town, Your Memory!
Immerse yourself in a charming world where city reconstruction goes hand in hand with caring for your mind. In Membal, you'll embark on a unique adventure, full of adorable fun and gratifying mental challenges.

name: Hike Adventures
description: Embark on a leisurely journey through enchanting places of peace and discovery. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature.

name: Legendary Tales: Stories
description: Discover stories hidden by time.

name: Lo-Fi Haiku: Coffee and Chill
description: Take a sip of coffee and wake up your inner poet!

name: Rainbow Moon + Rainbow Skies Strategy RPG Bundle
description: Over 100 hours of Strategy RPG glory!

name: Line Color World
description: Embark on a tranquil yet engaging journey in Line Color World, a unique blend of challenge and relaxation. As a delightful time killer, this game invites you to unwind while conquering a series of easily navigable puzzles that promise both mental stimulation and a soothing experience.

name: Hopping Bunny
description:
Hopping Bunny,
This rabbit needs to jump and overcome the obstacles that are dangerous for him,
Do you want to help him?
But you need to collect the Keys to pass the level.

When you jump, you can stop time!
This feature will come in handy because sometimes
You will need to maneuver in the air!

name: Kings Odyssey: Dwarves Tale
description: Unearth the secrets of the deep and forge your legacy in 'King's Odyssey: Dwarves' Tale,' where every hammer strike tells a story of bravery and brotherhood.

name: Cape's Escape Game 7th Room
description: Solve the mystery and escape from the room

name: Kings Odyssey: Rise of The Necromancer
description: Seize your crown and forge your legacy in the siege against the shadows — where the fate of Ravenglade lies in your hands.

name: WorldNeverland: Chocolate Donut Fair
description: Sin descripción

name: Alone in the Dark
description: The first attempt at remaking the 1992 game with the same name done by Eden Games, which got cancelled in response to the negative response to the sequel of that game.

name: Matches Puzzle 2: Classic Logic Arcade
description: A matchstick puzzle with matches is a real training for logic, intelligence and creative thinking!

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Mr. Krabs Brawl Pack
description:
Featuring unique money mechanics that enhance abilities based on how much money he has aquired, Mr. Krabs from SpongeBob Squarepants joins Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2!

This pack features:
• Playable brawler Mr. Krabs
• Alternate Mr. Krabs costumes

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Personal Boards 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball FX: System Shock Pinball
description:
Guide the Hacker through Citadel Station infested with cyborgs, mutants, and reprogrammed robots to defeat SHODAN.

Table Features:
- Jack into the Cyberspace Terminal mini-playfield for great rewards
- Watch out for the Cyborg Attack! If you take too long to shoot, your ball will be shot and jettisoned off your flipper
- Shoot with precision to 'Get a Head'. Reveal a second ball by hitting the correct one out of three severed heads
- It's a Mutant Menace! Hit all the enemies and escape by the elevator
- Brave all perils of the table to initiate self-destruct and defeat SHODAN for good

name: Pinball M: System Shock Pinball
description: Flip to the death in the depths of space. Guide the Hacker and defeat SHODAN.

name: Sonic Superstars: Shadow Costume for Sonic
description: Step into the intensity, mystery and ultimate footie-pajamas of this costume inspired by one of Sonic's greatest rivals! Embrace the darkness with the Shadow Costume for Sonic!

name: Ultimate Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Frenzy Blood
description: Immerse in 1930s alternative America noir VR shooter! Become a traumatized bounty hunter on the trail of insane doctor. Battle puppet villains, use realistic weapons, leverage alcohol and tobacco in this gripping adventure.

name: Secrets Under Eco
description: Explore Melior's military base in Secrets Under Eco; a 3D FPS pure metroidvania experience. Find equipment and fight enemies with unique wall-bouncing combat to escape the building and country that was once called home.

name: Supervoid
description: A fast-paced arcade runner with colourful minimalist visuals and a synthwave soundtrack.

name: Teared
description: Embark on a thrilling 3D arcade action-platformer adventure in Teared. Travel through 9 challenging levels filled with epic bosses and a variety of deadly creatures. Are you ready for this epic journey?

name: Exosky
description: ExoSky: Join a whimsical AI cat in a futuristic flight sim. Master stunts in a tech-inspired world with moddable aircraft and realistic physics. Explore beyond Earth in a blend of simulation and imagination. A pilot's dream of skill and creativity.

name: OG Puzzlers: Winter 2K23
description: OG Puzzlers: Winter 2K23 is an casual puzzel game with cute dog images. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Picker Bot 42
description: Explore, discover items, find Wassie lore, upgrade PB42 to gloriously defeat mutant plants and fly back home

name: Watch The Fish
description: Keep the fish water in jar as long as possible ! Watch The Fish is an arcade game where you have to show your dexterity to manage the fish water and get the best possible score. Choose to turn the wheel of fortune at your own risk.

name: AI Roguelite 2D
description: The world's first AI-generated 2D Action RPG.

name: Eco Of The Wild Online
description: "Echo In The Wild Online": A multiplayer survival adventure with dynamic landscapes, strategic boss battles, and cooperative exploration. Teleport between untamed realms, cultivate resources, and conquer challenges in this ever-evolving world. Explore, survive, and thrive with friends!

name: Evil Holiday
description: Returning to the parental home and an ordinary holiday dinner turns into a bloody hell filled with horror and death.

name: Splurge
description: You and up to 7 of your friends must battle it out to become the ultimate splurge-lord. Fill up your tiles and splurge them in order to spread your colour and eliminate every other player. Watch out though, as after too long, the map will start to shrink. Happy splurging!

name: Flake: The Legend of Snowblind
description:
Embark on this mystical journey in the role of Flake, an incredible creature.
Will you be able to walk the thin white line between good and evil?
What will you do with your chance to save the world that is hanging on a thread?

name: Redacted: Genome
description: Redacted:Genome is a survival action horror game where the player is given the ability to swap between various arm powers and rifle barrels to fight off enemy mimics in the third or first person. Craft ammo, food, and upgrade your abilities for the greatest chance at survival.

name: Keykeeper
description: Keykeeper is an enthralling turn-based tactical roguelike, enriched with RPG elements. Embark on a journey through diverse floors and biomes, vanquish formidable foes, and level up to acquire new spells. As you delve deeper, you'll be able to loot the finest equipment to aid in your adventure.

name: Chronicle Survivors
description: Chronicle Survivors is an Unreal Engine powered gorgeous action roguelike game with difficult, short (5-12 minutes) and meaningful objectives, thoughtful progression, variety of levels, loads of unique mechanic enemies and, of course, grindy epic loot with a continuous development path.

name: From Scratch
description: From Scratch is survival game set in a huge open world of over 50 square kilometers. Fight, craft and acquire resources to survive in a world overrun by zombies and wild animals.

name: WallWar
description: Fixed screen shooter

name: Walls of Rust
description: Take command of humanity's last Mechs with a deck of cards, and control the hex-based gameboard to stop the spreading corruption. In this turn-based strategy game, each run is one continuous battle, so make every action count.

name: Cosmic Slime Defense
description: 2D pixel art platform game in which you are in charge of eliminating alien enemies that try to conquer your planet.

name: Moto Knight
description: Moto Knight is the world's first Motocross Dungeon Crawler! Navigate your way through dozens of trap-filled stages while trying to keep your dirtbike upright.

name: My Music Oasis
description: myMO (my Music Oasis) is an immersive multiplayer game built for a community of DJs, Musicians, and Music Fans to share beats while raving in a virtual world that features player customizable Dance Clubs, DJ Controlled Lights & Awesome Visual Effects.

name: Meowphoria
description: Gather a harem of cat girls and save the world from the Singularity Dragon! It's a fun mix of metroidvania and dating sim, where every choice you make has consequences, and love is the surest step to victory!

name: The Battle of Embers
description: Embark on an epic journey in a high fantasy RPG defense multiplayer survival game that thrusts you into a mystical world of ancient spells, legendary creatures, and intense battles. As a hero, your mission is to defend against hordes of fantastical foes in a desperate quest for survival.

name: Why God?
description: Climb high up the Tower of Babel by swinging and dodging all the children of the Lord to be able to ask GOD in one once and for all because he has made you so horrible in a world 2D cartoony. Explore in the most frenetic way the sad but exciting story of our little Amalgama.

name: Call Center
description: Every wonder what it's like to work at a real call center? Well, here you go I guess. Don't get this game. It's really boring. Even if there are two endings, it's not worth it.

name: Fibonacci's Final Sequence
description: Prove your intelligence as a AI experiment by solving an increasingly complex sequence of puzzles. Construct and program marvelous logistical contraptions to solve numeric puzzles. Can you be the first experiment to finish Fibonacci's Final Sequence?

name: Lost in the Past: A Heart's Remembrance Labyrinth
description: Lost in the Past: A Heart's Remembrance Labyrinth is a story game about love, lost, hope, grief, medication, meditation and more. You will be the our nameless character and experience his memories.

name: Nemesis Z
description: Nemesis Z is an immersive FPS horror survival multiplayer game set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Combo Haven
description: Combo Haven is a platform fighter inspired single-player game where your only task is to perform the sickest combos possible. Progress through a variety of levels and compete for high scores. Uncover new mechanics, abilities and characters along the way.

name: RaceTrap
description: RaceTrap pits a team of drivers against a pantheon of racing gods. Play cards to sabotage the track the drivers are racing on as a god. As a driver, complete 3 laps with your life intact!

name: Kunkunkun
description: Go to the abandoned old school alone to investigate the ghost of KUNKUNKUN and be chased, how to become a real MAN? !

name: Samuza
description: Welcome to the world of SAMUZA! In this time attack obstacle course game, you play as one of the "SAMUZA" series of robots who tries to restore the lost world by finding it's allies.

name: The Trip
description: Dive into the mysterious and mind-bending world of The Trip. Embark on a surreal journey as a protagonist with no memory, exploring a psychedelic landscape filled with otherworldly portals, and hidden truths. Uncover your true identity in this immersive and visually stunning adventure.

name: Aperture
description: This is a first-person 3D puzzle game, inspired by modern societal and work-related mental health challenges. Players immerse themselves in the role of a person with mental illness, using "Aperture" to solve puzzles and uncover hidden memories.

name: Funny Football
description: This is a casual football game. You can control the movement of two football players by your two hands respectively at the same time which is not only definitely a big challenge but also can bring you a lot of fun, especially when you play the local PVP mode.

name: Inevitable Light
description: Survive and explore the vast and brutal desert of the INEVITABLE LIGHT. Shelter-in during sand storms, make fire during freezing nights, walk in the shade on boiling hot days, and most of all, stay away from the hyenas. Think through your next move. Resources are scarce. Death is inevitable.

name: In Corporeal
description: In Corporeal is a narrative-driven prevision platformer where you work with your own sentient death to escape a dreamlike prison. Swap between jumping over hazards while alive and phasing through walls as a ghost to overcome unique, puzzle-oriented precision platforming challenges.

name: Six Cabins in Serpent Ridge National Forest
description: "Six Cabins" crafts a subtle, atmospheric horror experience relying on environmental storytelling. As a lost hiker navigating an unfamiliar section of forest, you progress through the environment searching for lost keys that unlock clues to the enigmatic history of Serpent Ridge National Forest.

name: Space Nature Attack Tower Defense
description: Space Nature Attack TD is a tower defense where you can level up and customize tower stats and elements to your liking! Fend off various types of alien creatures across many different sci-fi planet themed maps, biomes, and difficulties!

name: Laxius Soul
description: Sin descripción

name: Moon Tower: Gotta Save the Universe Real Quick
description: Climb the Moon Tower in a thrilling precision platformer where every jump is critical. Master the distinct challenges of each level on your solitary ascent. Beware: one misstep can mean significant setbacks. Tackle the climb solo or engage your Twitch chat for a unique, interactive experience.

name: Gravity Dash
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the neon-lit streets of a cyberpunk city in Gravity Dash, a 2D infinite runner that will test your reflexes and strategic skills. Immerse yourself in the retro atmosphere, accompanied by a pulsating synthwave soundtrack that sets the tone.

name: Unknown place
description: Escape Unknown place.

name: Drifted
description: A paper airplane ventures into a vast world of darkness. DRIFTED (working title) is a narrative driven platformer.

name: Quadrium 3
description: Quadrium 3 is a new marble match game. The aim of the game is to clear the playing field by shooting the marbles from the edges and forming groups of two to remove them from the playing field. Various obstacles such as crates, glass, fog, deflecting arrows and portals add variety to the gameplay.

name: Imperialism: Concert of Europe
description: Imperialism: Concert of Europe is a turn-based grand strategy game in which you seek to maximize the power of a major nation during the 19th century through trade, industry, research, diplomacy, colonization, and warfare.

name: Nose
description: An easy [climbing] game by a gentle author.

name: Stickman World Battle
description: Stickman World Battle - new exciting and thrilling real-time strategy with famous stickman heroes!

name: Solitude
description: Beached upon the coast of a haunted land you must survive the trials of an ancient malevolent force which seeks freedom from its shackles. Battle against the horrors of the night, build shelters to weather the elements, scavenge for supplies and uncover the mystery at the heart of the island.

name: Moon Wars
description: Enemies have conquered the moon and planned for destroying the entire world except them as they feel superiority over the world. Player has to go through intense space mission and destroy enemies.

name: Golf Monday
description: Partake in what seems like a normal golf tournament. But watch out! Your competitors will stop at nothing to win.

name: Gardener's Quest
description: Gardener's Quest is a RPG filled with gardening and construction quests. Pick your favorite gardener and enlist in a company as you strive to gather funds and purchase a plot of land. On this land, build your one-of-a-kind house and garden for an extraordinary experience!

name: Blopper
description: Embark on a gravity-defying adventure in "Blopper" a vibrant dropper game that challenges your reflexes and strategic skills! Take control of the hero, a lively green slime with a penchant for bouncing, as it navigates through mesmerizing realms where gravity is but a whimsical plaything.

name: Anime Studio Saga
description: Embark on Anime Studio Saga! Go from a Manga Artist living with your mom to establishing your anime studio, create chart-topping series, developing talent, and pioneer new stories. Ascend to industry leadership, captivating a global fanbase as the unparalleled anime visionary!

name: Silent Cause
description: Single-player mysterious horror where you are trying to find out what happened to the family. While police found no cause from outside or from within the family. While case has been closed it started drawing all sorts of people from ghost hunters to private investigators, you are one of them.

name: The Island
description: O maior desafio em the island é sobreviver. Tudo quer que você morra - seja a vida selvagem da ilha ou outros habitantes,Faça o que for preciso para sobreviver.

name: Little Horrors!
description: Little Horrors! is a horror themed pet sim. Raise your new friend right, or it could end up causing complete mayhem!

name: Star Bind
description: Star Bind is an increasingly fast-paced action dungeon crawler where you'll need to shoot, dodge, loot, learn, and improve to escape a bizarre simulation.

name: TekSkeleton
description: TekSkeleton is a hardcore platformer of the Tek line. Run, jump, kill enemies, and avoid obstacles through 5 hand-crafted levels, enjoy the atmospheric retro graphics in the dungeon style.

name: Elements For Money
description: A turn-based game about forming reactions to pay off an ever-increasing payment demand.

name: Hoversteppers: Zone 1
description: Hoversteppers is a freestyle hoverboard skating game. Flip, spin, and test your boarding skills with timed challenges across multiple stages.

name: Co-omets
description: Sin descripción

name: Fussball Manager 24
description: Mod for the FIFA Manager series by EA to get the Manager-Experience with updated squads and other new additions.

name: Kiteretsu Soudan Dial
description: Kiteretsu Soudan Dial is an adventure game on PC. You have to take a call from the counselor and decide whether the content of the consultation is a spiritual mystery or not. The game has a time limit and you need to fill the quota within the time.

name: Monk Warriors
description: A Super Mario Bros. hack.

name: NonStories: Eien no Hakoniwa
description:
This is an event-based RPG.
It is a dark fantasy RPG with the content of an ensemble drama through conversation.
In short, it is an orthodox RPG in which everyone defeats the enemies that stand in their way while advancing through the events.
This is the first full-length RPG with an emphasis on scenarios in our game.

The difficulty level is high, and it is an unreasonable game in its own way.
We do not expect everyone to clear the game at all.
However, if you can complete a typical RPG just to reach one ending, I think you can go for it.

There are many long events, so it is not for those who want to operate quickly.
It is for those who want to proceed slowly and steadily. It is also for those who are not satisfied with a half-lengthy story.
However, I think it is not suitable for perfectionists.

name: Falling Balls
description: This game is a arcade game for one player. The aim of the game is to get the ball into the baskets at the bottom of the screen in the shortest possible path. The longer the ball travels across the screen, the fewer points you accumulate. It is a self-competiting game. This game is designed for one player.

description: Simulates the fission of Uranium 235 (U235) atoms.

description: A mod for Half-Life 2: Episode 2 about the story of Thomas, a man who owns data about the VAULT project. He will have to contact the Resistance and transmit data before it's too late...

name: False Destination
description: False Destination is part of a larger unfinished mod that was supposed to tell the story of Gordon Freeman found himself in the wrong place at the wrong time.

name: Apex Legends: Breakout
description: The Games are going into overdrive, legends. Drop hotter and hit different with Legend Upgrades—a new system that puts the meta in your hands by unlocking enhancements for armor and abilities. Each match is a fresh start and there’s no better time than now to try new strats on for size. Ranked returns reloaded and ready, tuned to a high-risk high-reward system that incentivizes combat through each split—yup, splits are back. Plus, make your Thunderdome debut in Mixtape, the Frontier’s deadliest entertainment venue. And that’s not all—Performance Mode, Breakout Rewards, a 5th Anniversary Collection Event, and even more. We’re bringing the noise for a fantastic 5th Anniversary season.

name: Inkidoki And Phoenix
description: Enjoy beautiful pictures, bright and exciting levels, and fun music!

name: A Husk at Dusk
description:
A Husk At Dusk invites you to step into Stanley the Scarecrow's magical corn maze. You'll be met with puzzles and challenges along the way in this autumn themed adventure. For those who complete Stan's maze there is a ... great reward waiting.

This is Lump Hammer Games' first release and we hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it! We dedicate this game to the memory of Stanley Bell (1948-2011) who loved video games, corny jokes and a good maze.

name: The Human Fly
description: You have to climb to the top of a many-storied building evading obstacles like window cleaners, police men or birds.

name: Ribbit
description: Frogger clone

name: Broken World
description: "Broken World" is an exciting post-apocalyptic low-poly game where players have to survive in a world overrun by zombies and chaos. Build and strengthen your shelters, fight various threats and explore a dangerous world full of secrets and dangers.

name: Nip For Speed
description: In the chilly night, emerging from a haze, you're in a vintage car hurtling down an otherworldly highway, driven by a cat. Cigarettes, moonlight and the open road, what mysteries lies ahead?

name: Atari
description: Sin descripción

description: A solitaire Pong variation.

description: Based on Foozball, this Pong variant has the players control a vertical three-paddle column.

name: Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Handball
description: Sin descripción

name: Hockey
description: An ice hockey simulation where players can catch and shoot the puck at the opposing goal.

name: Castles of Darkness
description: You have to defeat the evil wizard Grimnacht in order to rescue the princess in this animated text adventure.

name: Basketball
description: Basketball is an Atari 2600 game loosely based on the sport of the same name. The game features a simple game of one-on-one basketball playable by one or two players, one of the few early Atari 2600 to have a true single player feature with an AI-controlled opponent.

name: Volleyball
description: A volleyball simulation where the traditional (Pong-style) left-right volley is swapped for a top-bottom volley. Players can volley or spike.

name: Brick Blaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Power Block
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil: The Missions
description: Resident Evil: The Missions breaks down a giant zombie safari into 100 small stages, each composed of a just a few rooms and a small goal, such as rescue a helpful citizen or blow off a zombie's head.

name: 1px
description: 1px is a minimalist game with a focus on speedrunning.

name: Vinceworld
description: Vinceworld is a 1998 compilation of 30 experimental animations and interactive quizzes by Vince Collins.

name: R34Hunch
description: A game heavily inspired by Higher Lower Game but using Rule34 Tags

name: Xiao Ma Li
description: Sin descripción

name: Go to Bed
description:
A short horror game about going to bed.
Can you successfully pass each situation?

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Raw Thrills’ newest arcade superstar Wheel of Fortune delivers the same glitz and glamor of the Mega Hit television game show. With a Hi Def 32inch LCD touchscreen, incredibly realistic graphics and a Larger than Life Wheel, this game is a winner with children and adults alike.

name: Control the Body
description: A game in which one is tasked to control a body.

name: Lost and Foundry
description:
Take a trip to a place thought long lost...

Lost and Foundry is made out of my strong desire to make an Arcane Dimensions map and features. It features around 90 enemies and should only take 5-15 minutes to beat. I really wanted to understand the privatives that make up a typical map and be able to re-create them and make use of them multiple times properly in a way that didn't feel 'rehashy'. While Lost and Foundry isn't my first Quake map thanks to the Reload Jam, it was my first idea that I reworked and scrapped until around 2 months ago. I'm glad I persisted if not for the learning experience it gave me as I felt I learned a lot of Arcane Dimensions quirks and have a better appreciation for some of the iconic maps made in it. Feel free to message me any agregious errors that may softlock the player or break events. Not made or tested for any multiplayer but does have spawns.

name: Grejsimojs
description: An anachronistic 90s-style Episode 2 Replacement.

name: None Like It Hot!
description: An underground geothermal base, mixed with cavernous/hellish touches. A fairly tight and claustrophobic level, but with some open exploration and non linearity mixed in as well.

name: Daylight District
description: Daylight District is a Vanilla-Compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring remixed textures from Moonlit District.

name: Crumpets 2
description: Crumpets is a set of six, Boom-compatible maps released by Zachary Stephens (Ribbiks) in 2024.

name: Final Desolation
description:
A 100% vanilla 8 level DOOM wad, dedicated to Cacodoomonic's beloved late doggie Layla and their beloved late mother, both of which loved DOOM, and often used to watch them playing it. They both passed away, their dog on August 3rd 2023 and their mother September 27th 2023. This game is dedicated to them both and may their memory live on forever in this mod.

The wad is an 8 level chapter starring Joan Dark as she fights against the forces of Hell as it invades the UAC bases and gradually takes over. A powerful demon, code-named only DESOLATION, has risen from the depths of Hell and brought with it an army of darkness that is utterly relentless. DoomGuy isn't around. Nobody is around except the demonically possessed corpses of former fellow UAC military... so it's up to Joan Dark to deal with this on her own.

name: PhoboChromaPhobia
description:
PhoboChromaPhobia is an 11-map set for G/ZDoom.
Strange dreams are being reported by low-level personnel over at the UAC's Department of Biochemical Kaleidoscopetry. Better head to Phobos and get to the bottom of this disturbingly... colorful... evil. But is your mind ready for it?

name: The Mystery of Mount Fang
description: This is a vanilla-compatible four map mini WAD titled "The Mystery of Mount Fang". After enjoying your "vacation", you're hired by an anonymous benefactor to go hiking in Mount Fang, a huge mountain located in Hell. Your mission: To gather information and clues about about a long extinct civilisation that apparently worshipped a guardian spirit taking on the appearance of a huge shark. But you have a suspicion that the thing who hired you knows more about this place than they let on...

name: The Cursed Legacy
description: The Cursed Legacy is a supernatural investigation set in a dark and mysterious atmosphere. Keep calm and solve the riddles to unravel this strange disappearance. But be careful, you're not alone!

name: Reimei no Yu
description:
Reimei no Yu is a simulation-adventure game on PC.
You are an employee of the hotel and have to look around the room every morning to see if anything is wrong.

name: Drop Mahjong Tiles
description:
Drop Mahjong Tiles is a puzzle game on PC.

The actual mahjong score will be the score. The falling mahjong tiles (hai) are completely random, and like mahjong, there are only four identical tiles. It is not a competitive style and there is no time limit, so you can enjoy it at your own pace while thinking carefully.

name: Biohazard Anniversary Package
description: The Biohazard Anniversary Package was released in Japan in 2013. This package consists of Biohazard Directors Cut, Biohazard 2 & Biohazard 3 as a digital download. This also comes with physical copys of Biohazard Revival Selection & Biohazard 5 gold edition in greatest hits format. Finally it comes with Biohazard 6 physical as well as the Biohazard 6 art book.

name: RBO
description: INTRUDERS steal loot from PROTECTORS (house owners), and from each other in this physics-powered heist / home alone game by the creator of Hello Neighbor

name: The Tower of Archeos
description: Climb the tower of archeos and kill the evil sorcerer. An enhanced version was later released for itch.io and Steam.

name: Willy Wabbit & His Magical Books
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Dragon Adventure
description: The evil Chiro Empire has captured all of the other Dragon Eggs! It's your job to save them!

name: Picoracer-2048
description: A retro futuristic anti-gravity racing game!

name: Opening Night
description: A mystery at the comedy club

name: Carnival of Shadows
description: Carnival of Shadows is an English carnival-themed romance visual novel.

name: La maison perdue de l’oncle Ernest
description: The player has found an album that narrates the life of Uncle Ernest in a mysterious countryside house. He explores its pages to uncover secrets, navigating between them by clicking on bookmarks, all while having the option to keep with him the items he finds useful to solve the puzzles he encounters.

name: Enchant Farm
description: A highly customizable, exploration-focused game with countless secrets to uncover, bosses to defeat, and allies to recruit. ENCHANT FARM is one of the earliest and best JRPG adaptations of the "Souls-like" formula with a pure gameplay focus and surprising mechanical depth.

name: Megan The Fox
description: Megan the Fox is an endless shooting game developed by Ninja Kiwi, where you play as a fox named Megan and must survive against an onslaught of enemies for as long as you can, all while collecting gems to get equipped with upgrades.

name: Sarissa and the Legendary Sword
description: Sarissa and the Legendary Sword is a Brazilian turn-based RPG with a simple and beautiful story. In it, you will follow friends Sarissa, Dandara, Elaine, and Patricia, as they go on an adventurous journey, where love friendship, and a fated destiny will change their lives forever.

name: Caiobá
description: A short story, inspired by family trips I took to Matinhos-PR in my childhood. My first game made with lots of love and care is GameMaker!

name: Legend of Song
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy of Gun
description: Sin descripción

name: Saga of Song
description: Saga of Song is a fast-paced single-screen Platformer and a continuation of the Legend of Song. The game is filled with Imagination, complete with competitive online hi-scores and controller support, and fraught with plenty of flavor and danger for you to enjoy! Each randomly generated game consists of 9 Stages which contain treasure and stars to collect in order to maintain the Song and (completely) clear (3x) in order to progress.

name: Master System 3 Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Fight of Gun
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Mars Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Abyssal Blood
description: Abyssal Blood is an Action Rogue-like/Survivors-like where you can dual-wield many types of different weapons at the same time. Play as Lucy, the daughter of Lucifer, who must eliminate all outlaw souls and demons from hell.

name: My Uncle's Story
description:
Tired of life you can only think of getting out and making it all stop.

Thus, one day you found an adventuring magazine with survival tips and decided to run from it all. One day after work, determined to full fill this dream, you set out to build your new home in the middle of the Forest.

With only an handful of tools in your bag and an old truck, you begin building your house, log by log.

What could possibly go wrong...

name: Pinball Racer
description: A micro game about chasing high scores while being knocked around by pop bumpers.

name: 100 Romantic Cats
description: 100 Romantic Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Lovely themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of romantic places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Super Fruit Ninja
description: Fruit Ninja is back and this time the power is in your hands! Slice your way through 4 modes of fruit annihilating fun. Charge up juice canisters and unleash your Juice Jitsu power onto unsuspecting fruits! Play fetch with Truffles and make sure you give him a pat! Most importantly, make Sensei proud!

name: Yujian Love
description:
Yujian Love is a new type of animated love style game developed by NetEase. It is different from the general game of the same type, as the background of Yujian Love appears in modern and Japanese style.

The game uses Chinese ink and color rendering to create beautiful scenes and characters, with up to a million words of lines acting by top voice actors, players will experience a real feeling of life in the game!

name: Quando fuori piove
description:
Short game where you take control of two characters at the same time: a cop and a sniper. It's your job to stop the demonic activity in a palace.

Made in two weeks for the "Game Maker Italia 2018 Contest".

name: Pepe Chatters
description: Pepe Chatters is an exciting game in which the player has to help the cute frog Pepe solve riddles and puzzles to save his friends from the clutches of an evil sorcerer. With the help of clever jokes and a vivid sense of humor, Pepe will explore different levels, meet interesting characters and collect unique items to solve problems. Immerse yourself in Pepe's magical world and help him bring peace and tranquility back to his home!

name: Cell
description:
A homebrew horror game for the Nintendo DS.

Cell is a horror escape game where you need to solve puzzles in order to escape a room. It is very similar to the adventure-game design that was used on the main project by Tom Pike, The Fifteenth Floor, but smaller which takes advantage of music, sounds and detail.

name: Dengenki Days
description: Juno's rent money has gone missing! The end of the month draws near- what is an attractive and spunky girl to do in a situation like this? Join Juno and her friends as they try to earn some quick cash!

name: Budni
description: short "i wanna be the guy" fangame

name: Driftmania
description: Driftmania is an arcade time trial racing game. Your goal is to get the fastest possible time on each of the 15 challenging tracks

name: Portal Golf
description: Portal Golf is a physics puzzle game with portals. Place portals around the level in order to get the ball to collect every gold bar. You have no control over the movement of the ball and can only place portals before you start the run. Try to use as few portals as possible to earn medals, or just fill the whole level with portals and have fun!

name: Birds and Saws
description: Simple and addictive oldschool arcade style casual game.

name: BAS
description: Experience a nostalgic throwback with this Pico-8 demake of the classic iOS game Birds and Saws. Dive into the retro charm and challenge yourself as you guide a bird, skillfully avoiding menacing circular saws to rack up high scores.

name: Zedwolf
description:
A not-entirely-canon demake of the game 'Zeewolf' by Binary Asylum.

Pilot your Zedwolf chopper across 6.5 km^2 of 3d open world environment, rescue hostages and repel the enemy force's attack!

name: Phive Nights At Pico's
description: A remake of the first Five Nights At Freddy's game in PICO-8.

name: Mortal Cards
description:
Mortal Cards challenges you with the ultimate card playing experience… On a secluded island, six elite fighters have gathered to test their deadly skills.

Each competes with a deck of 15 cards, 5 cards each round, as they battle each other and finally, the 4-armed mutant warrior Goro.

name: Sudoku by MobilityWare+
description:
Sudoku Simple is just how it sounds - we aimed to create an easier, beginner-friendly sudoku puzzle in which color helps you become a sudoku solver! Love logic? But feel less logical when it comes to solving sudoku puzzles?
This sudoku is the easiest to learn available and has been called a revelation for some who wanted a simpler way to learn to solve sudoku puzzles.

name: Super Off Road
description: All the thrills of real off road racing with all-out dirt grinding, high-gear competition. Watch out for mud holes, jumps, and other obstacles as you negotiate many stadium off-road tracks. Based on the number 1 arcade hit!

name: Mad Survivor: Arid Warfire
description: Mad Survivor: Arid Warfire is one of the newest post-apocalypse survival city-builder RPG that sees you surviving the harsh and arid region created around you after nuclear warfare between countries around the world happened.

name: Thome Wake
description: An indie horror first-person game where you are in control of a streamer who learns from his viewers about Pisadeira, a demon/monster from Brazilian folklore. In disbelief, when he sleeps, Pisadeira doesn't allow him to wake up, leaving him stuck in his nightmare, and he has to figure out a way to leave, and finally wake up

name: DS Bungaku Zenshuu
description: Sin descripción

name: Fireman Sam
description: Fireman Sam is a video game released for the Nintendo DS in 2010 of the same name. Based on the TV series. The game features several mini-games, such as spot the difference games, observation games, and music games.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Klassic MK Movie Skin Pack
description: The Klassic MK Movie Skin Pack includes character likeness & voice from the 1995 film. Christopher Lambert as Protector of Earthrealm Raiden, Linden Ashby as Hollywood Kombatant Johnny Cage, and Bridgette Wilson-Sampras as Island Bound Sonya Blade.

name: Guns n' Angel
description:
Guns n' Angel is a flash game developed by Ninja Kiwi (which was formerly known as Kaiparasoft when this game was originally developed) and released on February 3, 2009. It's an action platformer game where the player takes control of a gun-slinging girl named Angel who travels across the world to stop an invading alien army.

Although Flash was discontinued on January 12 2021, Guns n' Angel is still playable through BlueMaxima’s Flashpoint, The Supernova Player and The Ninja Kiwi Archive.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 8
description: The eighth season (also known as Tempting Fate) of Love Island: The Game was released on February 14, 2024. A new volume will be released every Wednesday.

name: Voice of the Ancients
description:
Let me tell you a story! Meanwhile, you can sit at the fireplace, close your eyes, and listen to the tale about ancient hidden treasures and secret societies. This time, you won't just listen. You will be the hero of the story. It will be your adventure. Your voice guides the way. Can you solve the mystery just with your voice?

My game is highly optimized for blind and visually impaired people (thanks to the extensive testing by the Applevis forum members). Still, I developed the game also for other kinds of users:
For intermediate and advanced English learners, this game offers an unparalleled opportunity to enhance your spoken English skills.
And for all adventure enthusiasts, this game rekindles the power of imagination, often stifled by the graphical grandeur of modern video games.
Unleash your inner detective and unravel the mysteries that lie ahead, solely using your voice as your compass.
With the first episode available for free, what are you waiting for? Embark on this extraordinary journey today and discover the magic of storytelling through voice.

name: Frogapult
description: Watch out for the piranhas, gators, spikes and birds as you catapult Kalvin Kroaker through the dangers of the swamp so he can pursue a life of worldly adventure.

name: Blisterball! & Mad Bomber!
description:
Blisterball! & Mad Bomber! are a series of two 1 or 2-player arcade games for the Apple II.

Both games allow for single-player, as well as 2-player cooperative gameplay. Also allows for 2-player competitive play, where 2 players compete for a high score. The player controls a small ship or cannon on the bottom of the screen, which can move horizontally left and right using the Apple game paddles. The ship fires vertically upwards.

In Blisterball!, the goal is to shoot down bouncing balls as they bounce out of the chamber above the player. If the player is hit by a ball, they are damaged, and they fall into the drain below if they are struck 3 times. There is also a series of blister balls, which can be shot for bonus points.

In Mad Bomber!, the player must shoot bombs as they descend from slots above. If a bomb strikes the bottom of the screen, the player loses a point. 10 points lost, and it's game over. The player must regularly refill their ammo by bringing their ship to the edge of the screen, and if the player is caught in the explosion of a bomb, they lose 10 ammo.

name: Amstrad 10-Pin Bowls
description: A simple bowling simulator that was part of the included cassette tape from Your Computer Issue 5.

name: Futur Racer
description: This futuristic racing game was published as a type-in listing in the November 1989 issue of Amstar & CPC magazine. It contains five courses.

name: Flipper
description: A pinball game that was published as a type-in listing in the January 1987 issue of Amstrad Magazine.

name: Chris's Casino
description: “Chris’s Casino” is a casino game for the Virtual Boy that includes three games: Roulette, Blackjack and a Slot Machine.

name: Trio
description: A collection of three educational mini-games from Macmillan aimed at pre-school kids. Sam Goes Shopping tasks the player with finding the right shop that sells a particular item and the department within it. Computer Snap is a colourful card matching game where youngsters have to match two pictures before the computer or their opponent. Tables Test is an opportunity for kids to test themselves on their knowledge of the times tables.

name: Super Mario Kart: Pro Edition
description:
Super Mario Kart makes its comeback!

This hack is a complete remake of SMK, featuring 20 new tracks. The AI also works, meaning you’ll have to work for that first place in GP mode.

For when you’re feeling more like hitting your friends with shells and bananas, there’s also 4 new battle mode courses for you and your friends to determine who is the champion of battle once and for all.

If you played the original SMK and felt that you needed more of a challenge or wanted more to experience, then download this hack. You won’t be disappointed.

name: Defender Bros
description: Prepare your defenses during the day and survive until dawn. Defender Bros is a Tower Defense roguelike game where you play as a soldier defending your base. Pick between multiple abilities as you level up to increase you survivability, then after each run buy perks and become even stronger.
