name: Kind Heart Survivors
description: In the game Kind Heart Survivors, you are challenged to survive on an unknown planet, build your base, and face unprecedented challenges. Are you ready for this survival adventure?

name: Road Warriors
description: Survive on the road in this post-apocalyptic world! Road Warriors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where your goal is to create the strongest build in one run!

name: Siege 'n Sow
description: Unleash strategic mastery in this minimalist real-time strategy game. Micromanage units, expand territory, and fend off night attacks. Harvest resources, build structures, and command diverse units to survive relentless waves. Will you triumph or succumb to the shadows?

name: Liquidum
description: Liquidum is a water-themed logic puzzle game, where you strategically fill interconnected aquariums across six challenging sections with unique mechanics.

name: Parking Garage Rally Circuit
description:
Retro Arcade-style Rally Racing in repurposed Parking Garages in big cities across North America + UK

You said "Parking Garage"?
The “Parking Garage Rally Circuit” tour comes into a city, selects a parking garage, and temporarily turns it into an exciting rally course for a week-long competition. Each track in the game is styled as a unique parking garage that has been turned into a race course.

Players will use a map of North America + UK to chart their course from track to track across the globe.
Rally... Circuit?!?

This is a hybrid of Rally and circuit racing. From rally it draws the jumps and “one racer at a time against the clock” time-trial format.
However, the tracks are similar to circuit racing, with each race consisting of multiple laps around the same track (the track may change slightly from lap to lap, however)
Controls are very tight, simple and arcadey, similar to Mario Kart (accelerate, reverse, steer, drift), but with a bit more dynamic “smash into things” physics.

name: Moyashi Monogatari
description:
Moyashi Monogatari is a jump-and-shoot action game in which players explore Gensoukyou to reach the ending.

This game is made with Action Editor 4.

The English version of this game was translated by HakanaiBlue.

name: Wanko Mix
description: A GBA game by TDK.

name: Pocket Tuner
description: Pocket Tuner is a collection of rhythm mini games. Designed to be also used with the Pocketstation.

name: Alfaim
description: A visual novel for PC-88, PC-98 & Sharp x68000.

name: Junjou Romantica: Koi no Doki-doki Daisakusen
description: A PS2 visual novel based on the anime Junjou Romantica.

name: Seiken Densetsu: Friends of Mana
description: Seiken Densetsu: Friends of Mana was released in Japan on October 18th, 2006, as the second installment of the World of Mana Mobile series, with the mobile remake of “Seiken Densetsu: Final Fantasy Gaiden” being the first installment. It takes place 10 years before the events of Legend of Mana for the Playstation, and is the first Network RPG in the series. There is a monthly fee to pay for the game of 525 yen (tax included, which works out at just over USD$4).

name: Abdogtion
description: Some creepy presence lurks deep in the snowy mountains. Locals have been experiencing a series of strange abductions, but none of them were brave enough to do anything. Until the day our main protagonist lost his dog. Powered by little more than his fists, he's determined to break through the frozen wastes into the heart of the forest just to get his best friend back.

name: Source Checker
description: Test your re-source-fulness and try to identify fake, humorous and real news from each other. See if you know what news sources are and if you you spot a reliable one in a news story.

name: The Way Home: A Typing Adventure
description: Type your way through monsters and obstacles to help Emily find her way home in 'The Way Home: A Typing Adventure'. With four difficulty levels and powerful rune attacks, this game tests your typing skills in a captivating world of mystery and wonder.

name: Five Nights at Billy's
description: Billy and Van have had a glitch in their programing. It's up to you to make it through five nights and not let them get you.

name: Dicey Jump
description: Short jump or Long jump? Make the right choice before the saw gets hold of you.

name: Penguin
description: Penguin is a Chinese exclusive penguin-theme racing game released in 2004 for the Timetop GameKing.

name: Ares
description: A top-down vertical shooter that was released in 2003 for the Timetop GameKing

name: Duck Man
description: Duck Man is a 2D platformer released for the Timetop GameKing. The game is a unlicensed clone of the NES game Darkwing Duck.
2003 is a shoot-'em-up game that is bundled in the Timetop GameKing.

name: Kirby Triple Deluxe Match-Up
description: Kirby Triple Deluxe Match-Up a match-up member game based on the game Kirby Triple Deluxe.

name: Sadey's Sail
description: A casual resource management game about Captain Sadey, her trusty ship, and her rapscallion crew sailing the high seas in search of fortune and adventure!

name: The Ascension Of The Lamb
description: A "Retro PBR" game about a mysterious cult that disappeared in the early 90s.

name: Summon Dragons 2
description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Summon Dragons 2, the ultimate dragon-themed RPG game that takes you on a journey from a secluded ocean plot to becoming a legendary Dragonlord.

Build your island, construct powerful buildings, summon mighty dragons, and recruit skilled dragon trainers as you explore numerous dungeons and instances, each requiring strategic line-ups and tactics.

name: Buckshot With Friends
description: Tabletop horror game where you take turns firing a shotgun. The game can be played with friends or a dealer, creating an intense, suspense-filled atmosphere. Russian Roulette reimagined.

name: Pet Run/Stop
description: Tiny petscii arcadey shooty

name: XCOM: Long War
description: XCOM: Long War is a fan-made partial conversion mod for XCOM: Enemy Unknown and its expansion, XCOM: Enemy Within. Almost every aspect of the original game is altered, creating a longer, more complex campaign that presents players with more strategic choices and customization options. Long War adds a significant number of new soldier classes, abilities, weapons, armors, and usable items, and also introduces new features, including soldier fatigue and improvements to alien units over the course of the game.

name: Mannequin
description:
Mannequin is an up to 2v3 asymmetrical VR multiplayer game. Two elite Agents ruthlessly hunt an opposing side of three shape-shifting aliens known as Mannequins. Aliens hide in plain sight, blending in by posing as frozen human statues. They ambush unsuspecting Agents, dashing forward and freezing them in place with a single touch.

Agents use bleeding edge tech to hunt Mannequins, scanning for targets with their EMF Readers and taking them down with an EMP gun. It’s their job to decipher friend from foe. If they make the wrong decision, they’re exposed.

The last team standing wins in this tense, frantic game of cat and mouse.

name: Thunder Force AC
description: Thunder Force AC is a port of Thunder Force III to Arcades that also borrows enemies and stages from the earlier Thunder Force II, as well as adding some original content.

name: Thunder Force II
description:
A scrolling shooter and sequel to Thunder Force developed by Technosoft originally released for the X68000 computer before being ported to the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis game console.

The Sharp X68000 version has an introduction sequence and an extra stage (top and side view) not found in the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis version.

name: Silent Breath
description: Silent Breath is a horror experience powered by Unreal Engine 5. Featuring photorealistic graphics, fully dynamic scares and microphone detection.

name: No One Is Watching You
description: Point-and-Click-Adventure about the intrusiveness of being watched in your own Home

name: Maze of Apocrypha
description:
Maze of Apocrypha is a first person mazes adventure puzzle game in 3D for the Nintendo DS.

This homebrew was presented in the annual competition Drunken Coders 2010, ranked 1st.

name: Operation Libra
description:
Operation Libra is a escape the room game for the NDS. You must use the objects to interact with other items in the room to find a way to escape.

This is a full version game made in Actionscript for an in-school class, the game was originally named Entrapment. Over the course of a month, the art and game engine were created in Flash and was later used for the intended project. The game was ported onto the DS with extra features that were not previously included in the original Flash project.

It was ranked 1st in the NEO Summer Coding Compo 2009, Game section.

name: The 15th Floor
description: Built by a team of adventure-game lovers, The Fifteenth Floor is an adventure game featuring original character art, 3D models, and music. The game (developed by MindWave) has been 5 months into production, and is nearing completion. It has been inspired by games such as Myst, Crimson Room and Phoenix Wright.

name: PSP1G: The Incident 2
description: A prequel to PSP1G: The Incident.

name: Lights Off: Director's Cut
description: Play through a common childhood fear about turning the lights off and going to bed. This time extended, remastered, and re-imagined.

name: Roofcats Band: Suika Style
description: What do cats do on the roof? They play jazz, rock, metal and more! In this Suika-like game, you must match the cats to make new musicians appear, all while avoiding overflow and dealing with a crazy dog that shows up to mess things up. Will you be able to hear a killer guitar solo on the last cat?

name: The Transporter
description: Guide the tricked-out BMW to the Eiffel Tower completing Frank's latest job as the transporter. Five collisions and the BMW is toast.

name: Love Criminals
description: Love Criminals is a visual novel game that spans romance, fantasy, drama, and science fiction that immerses players in the tale of Hinode, navigating a dilemma involving mysterious girls in his uncle's manor. The narrative adds depth, capturing intrigue surrounding Hinode's encounters with potential cousins or impostors.

name: Meowsterpiece Museum
description: Great painters love cats and hid them in their masterpieces. Your mission is to find them and make the paintings even more beautiful.

name: Fire Race
description: Employ your drifting skills and power-ups to gain an edge, while dodging obstacles strewn across your path on the way to the podium.

name: Wathan Games
description: "Wathan Games" is designed to build bridges between streamers and their viewers, turning every game into an opportunity to strengthen community bonds.

name: The Shell Part II: Purgatorio
description: Detective Reiji Tokisaka is back to face down a mystery that spans decades if not centuries. With the aftermath of his last case weighing on his soul and a long-silent cult resurgent, can he solve the crime—or will it become his curse?

name: Braccobaldo Show
description: Play as Zio Sam and his friends, hired by a mafia boss to eliminate his main competitor, Ash and his Pokémon.

name: Kozyrev Horrors
description: Step into the Kozyrev Mirror to unlock your Extra Sensory Perception. Beware: dread and horror await. Investigate to find an escape from this liminal space. Are you truly alone? A short and chilling singleplayer horror game, inspired by the Kozyrev Mirror experiments.

name: Invisible Places: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Invisible Places is a minimalist jigsaw puzzle game that mixes GIF Pixel Art and photographs instead of static images.

name: HexOn
description: A relaxing puzzle game. Turn on each board by connecting all magnetic pieces to it.

name: Arctic Adventures: Episodes
description: Arctic Adventure is a HL2 Episode 2 based modification. In this mod you will ride quick as the wind through the Arctic landscapes in the hunt for the Borealis.

name: Pikmin 216
description: A challenging mod for Pikmin 2 by Teddiursayoshi.

name: Hunters On-Chain
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons & Dining Tables
description: Dungeons and Dining Tables is a Cosy-RPG where you delve dungeons to collect rare furniture to decorate your house! The comfier your house. The better your stats!

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Shadow Dragon
description:
A Shadow Dragon Remake on the 3DS!
This is a remake of FE1/FE11 using Fire Emblem Fates as a base. This is fully completed and you can play start to finish. It has all 25 chapters from Shadow Dragon as well as the five Gaiden chapters from the DS remake (No you do not need to purge your army to access them).

name: Half-Life 2: Very Hard Mod
description: A very hard mod for Half-Life 2: Episode 2.

name: Fred Durst Companion
description: Adds Fred Durst as a playable companion to New Vegas, including his unique loadout, dialogue, combat style and audio tracks from Limp Bizkit songs.

name: Guano
description: Play as a delightfully dumb seagull, find food and complete quests to help free the Grand Masters and gain their powers. Harrass humans and free the Pohemeda Islands from the evil Food Inc. with your powerful poop and loud screams!

name: Hayarigami DS: Toshi Densetsu Kaii Jiken
description: From chain mails that leads to murder, mysterious suicides and missing children, you, as a police officer have to put all your brain cells to work, connect the events together to discover the truth.

name: Toko & Kraft: Artificers
description: As a newly graduated artificer, our protagonist is assigned to a small village connected to some very big mysteries. Combine elements alongside your (usually) trusty assistant Kraft to meet your zany customers' needs.

name: Hayarigami 2 DS: Toshidensetsu Kaii Jiken
description: You are part of the elite police force team. Find the culprit and his identity before he finds you. Investigate urban legends associated with bloody murders via scientific or occult methods leading to different results. And only combination of these methods can reveal the truth behind the case.

name: Code Age Brawls: Futatsu no Kodou
description: Code Age Brawls: Futatsu no Kodou is a 2005 role-playing video game. Forming part of the Code Age media franchise, the story follows the character Lost L as they resist an apocalypse caused by an artificial world's control system, joining a resistance group's fight against the hostile Afternova faction. Gameplay consists of turn-based battles where the player absorbs the abilities of defeated opponents. A player-versus-player multiplayer function was prominently featured.

name: Super Extra Team Dungeon Game
description:
Super Extra Team Dungeon Game is not just a game, but a interactive experience for communities. Get ready to explore the depths of the dungeon, collect treasure and level up with your team.

The spiritual successor to Super Extra Console Dungeon Game, where you can dive deep into the abyss of the dungeon with your stream viewers as your battle party! Awesome pixel art graphics, multiple classes, over 50 monsters, exciting boss fights and more!!!

Now with Discord support! That is right you can connect to your discord server and play with your friends! Plus we support Twitch chat integration for our streamer friends out there.

You can play with the keyboard, controller or the mouse, so get ready and beat those monsters back to oblivion with your community!!!
